Text: Is it possible to have this as a AVI file.  Started watching on Mininova and have not been able to pick up the more recent episodes..thanks

Great to see this uploaded, yes I to was getting this from mininova, when I wasn't catching it on TV. I hope you're about to upload this weeks show,
Although I applaud any uploader I'm not impressed at those who start, but don't continue a season. Cheers.
I also would like too have it as an avi thanks

yeah this is blatantly mislabeled, there is only one season of sex rehab, this is season ONE episode four, meant to be called S01E04. the original release was fine in my opinion so considering the confusion caused by the typo its like why bother. oh well.

what i'd really like to see uploaded is episode 6, S01E06. it's the only one not available on the nets which is really a bit frustrating.
